articles.author: Julie Bloom
articles.title: Lashes, Lashes, Lashes: What It Took to Give the ‘Bombshell’ Women the Fox Look
articles.description: The makeup artists behind the film used prosthetics, base color, eyeliner, pounds of lash glue and lots of lip gloss to get the Fox look.
articles.content:
Getting that Fox look though wasnt easy. Baker and Kazu Hiro, who created the prosthetics for the film, and the team went through troves of images, documentaries and spent months watching clips of Fox, to study the womens faces and on-air uniforms.

articles.author: Sam Sifton
articles.title: Merry Christmas
articles.description: Make the holiday even brighter with waffles, pancakes and some mulled wine.
articles.content: Good morning. Merry Christmas even if all that means to you is that the streets are empty and you got to work in record time. Go see Little Women in the afternoon and hit up the Chinese restaurant after: beef and broccoli, moo shu pork, dumplings, green beans… [+350 chars]

articles.author: Caryn Ganz
articles.title: Allee Willis, ‘Friends’ Theme and ‘September’ Songwriter, Dies at 72
articles.description: Her writing and co-writing credits include “Neutron Dance” for the Pointer Sisters and “What Have I Done to Deserve This?” for the Pet Shop Boys and Dusty Springfield.
articles.content:
Allee Willis, one of the music industrys most colorful figures and a musician whose eclectic credits as a writer and co-writer included Earth, Wind & Fires September and the Friends theme song, died Tuesday at 72.

articles.title: 3 Family Members Drown in Mysterious Pool Accident in Spain
articles.description: A father and his 9-year-old daughter, both British, and another relative, an American teenager, died after getting trapped at a resort near Malaga. A faulty drainage pump was suspected.
articles.content: Three members of a family vacationing in southern Spain drowned after getting trapped in a swimming pool, prompting an investigation into a potential malfunction with a drainage mechanism that may have sucked them underwater, the authorities said on Wednesday… [+896 chars]

articles.title: Portuguese Style in Goa, India
articles.description: This three-bedroom villa in a popular area on the western coast of India is on the market for $836,000.

articles.author: Roxana Popescu
articles.title: House Hunting in India: Portuguese Influence Survives on the Coast
articles.description: Tourists from home and abroad have long flocked to the coastal state of Goa, where the market is currently rising as a result of restrictions on foreign buyers.
articles.content:
Those foreigners typically bought historic villas built during the period of Portuguese rule, he said many with large, airy verandas, tall ceilings, thick walls and tile roofs and restored them. They liked that colonial art form.

articles.author: Nicholas Kristof
articles.title: Kristof: It’s possible no one will read this column
articles.description: We columnists imagine our articles going viral, sweeping the world, carried into Cabinet rooms, changing history. And then I wake up.
articles.content:
We columnists imagine our articles going viral, sweeping the world, carried into Cabinet rooms, changing history.
And then I wake up. Today Im sharing with you my clunkers, columns that were read by well, perhaps by my wife. And my mom. If they werent busy.… [+4739 chars]
